lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) No, we don't want to!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam! You have a word to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marvel Puzzle Quest has epic news, guys! They're celebrating four years strong, starting today! Today, it's literally the only thing on my mind. When I heard that Rogue and the other X-Men are kicking off the celebration, I was like, "Vecna who?!" Forget that an immortal psychopath will probably wipe out three years of hard work on this show! Give me Marvel Puzzle Quest! Today, October 5th, is a big day. Not because we're facing the ultimate harbinger of doom who will surely cut short our lives and story, no, but because, in 11 days, on October 16th-- until then-- Marvel Puzzle Quest gives you free gifts! Double XP rewards, including the all-new X-men versus Apocalypse event, which is the only event I'm thinking of, and the only event that kept me awake last night in a cold sweat until 4:00am. A cold sweat of excitement for Marvel Puzzle Quest! Did I mention that you can recruit Gambit for the first time? I'm not crying inside anymore! Did I also mention Nightcrawler is coming later this month? Nightcrawler, who can teleport around and isn't frozen with fear, contemplating his inevitable demise two hours from now, at the hands of a one-eyed master of hell who will destroy everything and everyone we've loved! So download Marvel Puzzle Quest now for free on Apple and Android devices because I'm so happy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Written through wine and tears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you, Marvel Puzzle Quest. Do we have any merch updates, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (fake sobbing) There's shirts and there's hats and there's hoodies! And there's Tarot cards, and-- No, but seriously, the shirt of Matt, of our evil DM who's about to kill us all, you can get a shirt that has his face on it, evilly smirking, so it's perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The last thing Vox Machina ever sees, immortalized on a shirt. It's the grinning face of our destroyer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check it out! There's a ton of stuff available! It's great. And we've got some really awesome stuff coming up for the holidays, too, so keep that in mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Critical Role urns to hold the ashes of your friends!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Foster. We can all drink together on set. Don't forget to submit any of your fanart or gifs to submit@talksmachina.com. Do you have a Wednesday Club episode coming up, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doing monster books. We're going to be talking about the origins of Groot and some of the big creepy monsters of yesteryear, and some modern creepy monster books. I, Vampire, and etc. Fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. Thank you, Taliesin. Also, apparently, Twitch has extended Sub-tember all the way to Sub-tober! Or at least, up until Twitch Con, which is in a few weeks. So if you're a first time sub, you get half off for a few more weeks on every channel. If you want to support this or any of your other favorite channels on Twitch, now is the time to do it before this goes away, or it becomes Sub-Vember. So check it out, and awesome! That is all of our announcements, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have enough nervous energy to power the US Navy right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's shaking his leg so much. Don't move your leg!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going to have blood pressure issues after this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Managing to recover them within an inch of irrecoverability, you sent them with Gilmore off to safety as the black knight made its way up the staircase, Arkhan heading it off at the pass, giving you the opportunity to rise up to the top of the tower to face Vecna, the Ascended. You quickly take these last 20 or so seconds as you rush up the steps, one after the other, your heartbeat pulsing through your body, your breath coming in and out with staggered beats. Vox Machina, what do you want to do with these last 20 seconds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take out a vial of holy oil, and I'm going to dip my needle arrows that Tary gave me into the holy oil. I'm going to pour the remainder on Trinket's claws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are we from the entry to this chamber, or whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain. As you guys are ascending, you begin to see a peek of greenish light that's peeking up ahead, starting to brighten the spiral staircase as you ascend. You get the sense you're getting close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we get 20 feet away from it, 15 feet away from it, I'm going to cast Unseen Servant and hand him my whip. Tell Scanlan Two: buddy, I need you, but not right away. When this whip falls, come in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The secondary Scanlan takes a moment, looks at you, nods. "Okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe in you, buddy. I've always believed in Number Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Truer words were never spoken. And if you fall, I'll tell the tale of the Scanlan that left "me with his Number Two Whip."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love you, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love you, too." You're not sure if you should go in for a kiss or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We shake hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm waiting. I'm waiting to see our foe before I smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the record, as the ascent and the time it's cast, you'll probably arrive at the top of the tower with about-- for the purposes of gameplay and time wishy-washiness, I'll give you about 30 seconds, once the encounter starts, in which the Haste will remain. 25 to 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that conversation was happening, I tug Keyleth back and the wings flex out and around in a bit of a shell around us. Quickly. Forever and ever and always. I steal what I assume is my last kiss. Let's go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no, I'm already crying! We haven't started!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why can't we hear you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, can you hear me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There, now we can!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Before we go out there, let's hold hands real quick. Just know, I love you guys so much and you're my family. We're going to make it through this, okay? I'm going to cast Holy Aura on everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that? What does that do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, basically, if you stay within 30 feet of me-- I can't even read this because my eyes are watering. You have advantage on all saving throws and other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All saves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, Matt's correcting you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like as long as they're within 30 feet of you when you cast it, then you guys can run anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?! That's even better!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so advantage on saving throws? Anybody attacking us gets disadvantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that on melee attacks, or all attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attack rolls.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When a fiend or undead hits an affected creature with a melee attack, the Aura flashes a brilliant light. The attacker must succeed on a constitution saving throw or be blinded until the spell ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fucking great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why haven't we always used this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about it. She's been at her books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's all growed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The artifact now pulses with the same green energy that sparks from his voided socket. Across his long tattered red robes and his dark golden armor, his ribcage glows from within, sending beams of sickly green light out at each gap. And there, floating in the bones, the faint outline of a small humanoid form locked within. Make a perception check, everyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is it, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, nice. So you five look up to see an unconscious little girl, of human and elven descent. Velora floats, encased within the ribcage of the avatar form. She appears to be in some sort of a trance and is held by nothing but air and energy. A terrible familiar smile creeps across the face, his thin mummified lips curling into an impossibly long exaggerated smile that defies the constraints of the skull that held it. "I was curious who would seek my blessing first. You all "have proven driven enough to deserve the personal touch of my wrath. When I discovered your wily "tricks merely shifting about beneath my nose, the humor of it was not lost on me. This omniscience "is still new. I learned to push my limits with each passing moment. I thank you for showing me. I "reward you by sharing with you the ruin of this once beautiful city, a familiar oblivion to you "each, now perfected." I would like you all to please place yourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so simple and beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've arrived.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like it's not what we think it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Place yourselves around this entrance in what order you would've ascended to this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Vecna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that thing in the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you once you place yourselves based on how you ascended.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're right near the entrance, right, no further?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody just came out and we're standing in a big clump right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you wanted to scatter, let's say about anywhere from 15 to 20 feet from where the entrance is as you rush out to look over the side of the wall. All right, we have Percival over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on the other side of Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you move Keyleth to where Percival was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll say over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be next to Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Vex now? She's over there? I'm going to go to the side of this glowy thing. Can I get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get about this far. For just the ascension.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to be close to Grog, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The action that I held coming up the stairs. Can I cast Enlarge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you can do that as he's speaking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I get any farther with my wings out? I popped them out before we came up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then (whooshing). There's Grog. We'll say you can get, for the sake of placement, about 20 feet up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I wanted to hover like five feet above--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To this side? Because you have your wings out, sure. I'll let you get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is going to stay right at the entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guard that entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's just waiting to see what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you see this, Ash?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just see a lot of swirls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ash, I'm going to take a picture and send it to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure you get his good side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man, he looks so cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you do this, Matthew? You made this, didn't you? You painted it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I had friends help me, because I've been planning a wedding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was actually converted from my Critter gift a while back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So even the community helped. So to give you some perspective in size to his newly ascended avatar form, all of his power focused into a single, physical entity, that is the Vecna produced since the Ritual of Seeding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Holy crap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do this. Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire myself for this roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an ability check, I think, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I don't have a turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already forgot. It's like I just walked into Target. I've lost all brain function.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil. Hey, not bad!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Now we got the music going. All right. So 30 to 25?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you all so fucking quiet over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Percival. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking gnomes! What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley, what did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a chime.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Off to a good start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless I can inspire myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm not going to get anywhere higher in the order.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might go before whatever some of the shit that he doles out. He's just going to consistently dole shit out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, this is awful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna goes first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course he does, he's a god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got to be fucking kidding me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he stands above, he lifts his hand. You watch as the atmosphere above, at the outskirts of this cyclone above the city, a tear in space and time begins to rip. A familiar sound you've heard once before. You watch as giant flaming rocks, three of them, go firing down into Vasselheim. You watch as the apex of the temple of Kord gets impacted and crumbles down to one side in a flaming ruin. You watch as a secondary one slams down into the center of the city, in a familiar district to you, Pike. And a third one goes arcing off towards the temple of the Raven Queen. And with a distant explosion, the flash encompasses that vicinity. This is what you would notice, if the fourth one didn't come flying straight for the top of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn it. It's personal now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams into the center of the tower apex, I need everybody to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody gets advantage. Yes, and he gets disadvantage on things against us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We get advantage on saves from Pike's spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any spell from an evil creature that attacks me takes 4d6 radiant damage and is knocked prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct. So go ahead and roll the damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Grog within ten feet of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then you get plus two from me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, did everyone pop their blessings?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we all popped our blessings. Yes, Pelor! 12 radiant damage. Woo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, I think he's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's bloodied. He's definitely bloodied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what did you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, for saving throws? Sorry, I rolled my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what is this? Saving throw for dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get to add plus four right, because we're blessed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: d4, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29. Plus three. That's 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just succeeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, if we roll a natural 20, that doesn't mean it's an automatic success? We still have to add numbers to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ones are an automatic fail, twenties are not successes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But letting you know, that's still barely a pass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 is his--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DC.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just made it. Pike, what did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20. Not a natural 20, but 19 plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everyone who failed, you take 67 points of bludgeoning damage. Halved if you succeeded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 34?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 66 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 67 and 66, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I take half of that as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And evasion evades all of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do an uncanny dodge for any of that? That's just for melee attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uncanny dodge is for a melee attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll get the calculator out, because my brain is not working.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what kind of damage was this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bludgeoning and fire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have resistance to bludgeoning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have resistance to fire, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say 66 points of damage is what you take.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, Pike and anybody with a concentration spell, I need you to make a concentration check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I, with the evasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not, because you did not take any damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a plus what now? Charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you get advantage on that saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember three meteors last time, not four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, there's no way we can beat the amount of damage he did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With half the damage? No. So Holy Aura fades.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy Aura fades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's too much damage, no, you're right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whip falls to the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, you took 30-- I'm sorry, you took half damage from everything. No, it's still 66. So you guys do drop your spells, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Literally, oh my shitty, undead god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This a lot. I'm having a hard time figuring out this damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Figure out the math here, because it sunders the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sunders is not a good word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if we can't fly--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sunders the tower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Break. To split asunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I could get somebody to take this off here for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that map was so pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're splitting the party!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you make that? How did you build that thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is crazy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not cool, dude.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worst Carvel cake ever!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. He ordered these. They are cake stands and I was like, oh are these for our wedding cake? And he was like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You cracked the tower! What is the matter with you?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cake of fucking death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at a loss for what we're looking at right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, this is so cool, but terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at precisely 70 points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So using the photo replication of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it floating, like a gravitational state?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I also need everyone to make a strength saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saving throw at advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because she lost Holy Aura, because he fucking did all the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, it's in the wrong direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right, take your time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I'm airborne, do I make the same strength saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Anyone who's flying doesn't have to worry about it, necessarily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where were you earlier, fucker?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let us know if we can help.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wait, did you say anyone who's flying doesn't have to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't have to make the strength saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should be okay. Because of your dope-ass Sarenrae wings or whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as that detonates and sends it this way, that puts us--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Holy Aura's gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep. That fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was fun.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It saved us a bunch of points of damage, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he knocked prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's immune to prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course he is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's immune to prone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does he make love? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You went there, that fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's so happy though, now that his hand is back. Let me tell you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only up against a wall, for Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all got slammed and scattered across this tower, from the explosion. Where he is now, currently. Uses his movement to shift over here and move up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Best laid plans, huh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can your thing still--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It should still be able to work, yeah, theoretically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Theoretically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slash hate you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So after the explosion hits, the ringing in your ear begins to subside, your vision returns, and you look about the now-broken tower. You've grabbed on to what you can, so strength saving throws for those who weren't flying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 22, I mean. 22. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everybody but Scanlan makes the save. So Scanlan, with the detonation, you get thrown off the side of the tower and begin to plummet off the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll put you right there for the time being from the impact of it. Moving back, that's going to end Vecna's turn. Grog, you're up first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I roll initiative for the guy in the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the whip is down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should've sent the guy in the hallway in first, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that from his perspective, you were like, "If the whip hits the floor, come after us." (footsteps) (yelling) (crashing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, did you roll 4d6 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of radiant damage to him. The flash hits, he floats up, and now you can see he chuckles, looking down at the destruction. The green tendrils of energy, the vein-like projections that have been clutching the tower together, are now extending out like tethers, grasping the bottom of each floating island that used to be the top of Entropis as they slowly shift, held in place, and rotate around, the storm still cycling around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so crazy! They're like floating things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hasted, can I attempt to leap from this island to the one that Vax is currently on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it looks like those electro-touchy balls? What are those called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? Yeah, easy. You leap over, it would be 20 feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move to this corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I attach the chain of returning to the Sword of Kas, and throw it up to Vecna? Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reckless?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like it matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything is reckless at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits. So as you're getting the chain, as you leap over and go running across the platforms, you can see the entire platform is lilted to one side and some stones are tumbling and skidding off the side. You can see bits of the stone are charred from the immediate destruction and impact of the meteors. And as you pull the chain out, as you rush and attach it, the voice pulses through your head. "Yes! He's here. Right there. Kill him! Take him down! Deliver me!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't wait. Okay. Calm down. 22. This is undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus four, so 37 necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Necrotic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well no, I'm sorry. Not necrotic. Just 37 regular slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 37 points of slashing damage. All right. With that you toss the blade up into the side. "Oh." And you see for a second, there's a brief flash of recognition and a slight sliver of worry on his brow for but an instant, before his hand reaches up and grabs towards to try and pull the blade out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pull the chain back, catch it with my hasted action, throw it again. Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay so you pull it back and make your attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20. That's a nine so 34 plus one. 35 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each time, you begin to grow more and more nervous with the proximity of the blade towards the currently unconscious and contained little girl inside the chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Others may. You may be fine. But it's passing within like a foot of her each time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is she in relation to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inside the chest cavity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Got to keep that in mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second time as it hits, there's another flash of dark energy. Are you withdrawing it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make another check to pull it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she like in his chest cavity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, contained in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 19. That'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, You pull it back. Is that your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm frenzied so I have another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Reckless. Last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. No, I'm sorry. Because you used--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Attack was to throw one, but I only get the one because I can't do attack-attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then the hasted is another action and then the bonus is to make another attack, but only a single.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's a 30 flat. No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm thinking for this, because it's not like the hammer you throw up, returns every single time. It's like you impact and then you have to pull it back each time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It takes more than an attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's now 30 feet above you. 35 technically, but you're in large mode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have some speed left. Can I run and jump across? I want to land over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know you do, but do we as players care about this girl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Yeah. That'll work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you do you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Up here man, shit's floating in the fucking air--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you run and leap and bound, you manage to catch the edge. Let me check real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean I did just kill your daughter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true. So it is up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She was brought back, but I did kill her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Casualties of war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, a number of feet up to your strength score. If you move at least ten feet on foot, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feet up to my strength score?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move 26 feet with a jump, as long as you get ten feet of run-up because of your speed. So yeah, you leap across without issue. The chain is taut as you Tarzan-swing across the way and land on the other side, still holding on to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did that feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Delicious." He's talking to you from a distance. At the end your turn, Vecna's going to use two legendary actions--

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Two legendary actions?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, to cast a spell. As a reaction, as you glance past. "Oh no, we cannot let that stay near." And as he pulls out and opens his hands, I need you to go ahead, Grog, and make a-- Actually, you don't make a saving throw. Grog vanishes from the battlefield. Gone. You watch as this space closes around it. Grog. You suddenly appear in a darkened tunnel of some kind. You look around and you can see hard walls to each point and ahead of you, it splits in two different directions. Behind you, it splits into three different directions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm back in the chest of the titan? Does it look familiar? Do I remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks completely unfamiliar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It splits in two behind me--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two ahead of you and then three behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you in the Maze of the Abyss?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I recognize it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've never seen this place before in your life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not my turn anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. That's the end of Grog's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's another plane.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I completely forgot that happened last time. Of all the tactical things I watched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't him that did it. It was the other guy. It was the death knight that did it to you last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. It was the death knight. How did we fix that last time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look over at Percy and grab his hand for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do enough damage to make him drop concentration. That's what you did last time to bring him back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I regret nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing at all. Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hunter's Mark Vecna. All right. Bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, get ready Vecna--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 1d6, bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not helping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's wearing it like a bangle from the 80s.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like how he's surrounded by swirls of Aquafresh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to run over to where Grog had been-ish--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And mourn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cry over you? Not quite that far. I'm staying against the wall. Yeah, that's better. Not that it matters very much. Then I'm going to shoot him with my holy damage/needle arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that is a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Can I make it a bramble shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm falling, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are. You got lobbed off the side from the explosion and the tower crumbling beneath you. You couldn't find purchase. You grabbed part of the stone and your fingers slid and scraped off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got something for that, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but gets me out of commission for a round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to figure out how to get Grog back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 41 damage. And he has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That breaks concentration, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Don't look at that. What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's going to burn a legendary resistance. He does not want to be restrained right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has used two legendary actions and a resistance, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but I think he gets two or three legendary actions per turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he burns off that. So that was a total of 41 damage. So half that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait! Oh, never mind. Yes, 41 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he succeeds. That's 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to hit him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had to roll a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hit him again with another needle arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't be afraid of rolling ones, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that before I hit it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11. Did it move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't what it was before I hit it with this dice.

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Reroll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Actually, I think that was probably it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was lower. Since we're being honest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this your #blessed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 25 to hit? I'm sorry, yes, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That's good. 25 hits. 19. That's it? I don't get any sneak attack? Nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 points. Does he get any holy damage from those arrows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. What it does is it bypasses or can hit creatures that normally are immune to non-magical weapons like those ghosts and things, so it doesn't have an additional effect that you can see from it, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how much damage was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey now, this is our first god we're fighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. He does make his save still. So as the two arrows swish past and slam into part of his neck, it seems to pass through, a period where it's just energy. A second one whisks through the bottom of his body--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus another one point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20. And he glances down at you, the eye flashes, "Oh don't worry, I'm coming for "you soon enough." That end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I forgot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm inspired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel a little better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've taken enough care through aiming to not strike anywhere near who you recognize within.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What size would you say Vecna is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would be considered gargantuan. Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I can't grapple him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have the powerful build. So you're considered large, and you can grapple one size larger than that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is going to look around, really confused, and scooch a couple of squares closer to Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, perfect. That ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna, end of your turn, is going to use a third legendary action to use a Firebolt against-- let's say against you, since you just shot him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So spell attack. That is a 35.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To hit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he do a Flame Strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 4d10. Nope, it's a Firebolt, a cantrip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) It's a cantrip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of fire damage to you. As the bolt slams into you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. He takes 4d6 radiant damage again, from hitting me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolls for concentration. Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God! That means we get Grog back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and use his legendary resistance to maintain it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My despair is growing by the second with those words that you just uttered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many legendary resistances does he get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has as many as he wants. He resists everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to finish your turn, I believe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a weird feeling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to keep hitting him and try to break his concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Vax, you're up next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click the boots. What I'd like to do is fly within ten feet of him. To do that, how far am I flying? I have 120 feet of movement, wings out, hasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. From that distance, about 45 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spending 45 feet to get there? Once I'm in ten feet, as a bonus action I cast Vow of Enmity on him. To start. I have no idea if I'm in range? It doesn't seem like I'm in range, but I don't know. But that's within ten feet of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, about ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just in case, I'm going to use my hasted action to disengage and fly away from him-- no! I'm going to use my regular action to attack twice as a paladin. At advantage, first one (groans), I'm going to use--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus four!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, plus four. Hold on, where did my four go? Someone give me a four! I don't know where my own four went.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I was going to hand him the same one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Take the dark purple, moody one! Or I should have given you a different one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be plus one. I already did that. It's going to be a 24 on that, to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is a 25. The first one is Whisper and it does (counting). Oh, shit! I wanted to throw it at the tome. Does that change anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be a different roll. Then we'd have to roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind. 19. Can I reroll the second attack? Nah! Forget it. (counting) 44 for the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 44 points of damage. Natural 18. He makes his concentration check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and the second attack is nine. And I will dump poison into it, which is stupid, but I'm going to do it anyway! He's the only one here. He has to make a DC 15. Come on, big guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's immune to poison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After my two paladin attacks I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, how many points?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine. Then I'll use my hasted action to disengage just in case he can curb stomp me and I want to fly to here and hover ten feet above that chunk of cake. Just remember I'm floating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has cardiac arrest and dies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to continue on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that heart disease! It's the number one killer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now we're on the initiative count 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. The dead rise. Bits of scattered bone and corpses that litter the top of this tower, many of which have been thrust off in the explosion and charred and destroyed from the impact, others begin to clack together and rise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not afraid of this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine skeletons rise from the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine times!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get your skeleton ass away from me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That will do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we hit the table like we're tilting a pinball machine, and knock him off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so those two take an attack against you, Vex. That is 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To hit? Doesn't hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now against Percival, it's a natural 20. You take ten points of slashing damage, as the skeleton pulls this rusted scimitar to the side and rakes it across your chest. Then against Keyleth, a natural three is not going to hit. Against Pike, an 18 is not going to hit. Against you, Vax, that doesn't hit. I think that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does your armor, Pike, do anything against people that are attacking you with melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'd have to hit though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan Two is up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to, if there's a path up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is currently clutching on the side of this. So he didn't have to worry about watching the whip drop. It's the rest of the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he in a place where he can climb, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general athletics check for him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven? Plus four. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Does he want to try and inspire himself? It's an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. I want to do so much other than try to hang onto the floor at this point. Shit. I guess he'll inspire himself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a d12 and add to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, roll and add two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, add the roll to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well that just makes it 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 is just enough. It's not super hard to climb this, you get just to the edge there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're little and light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Scanlan Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is my friend, Scanlan One?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all the conversation we can have in one action. No time to respond to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. In that case--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's all your movement for him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, great, yeah, of course it is. And his bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did he use his bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well it's not inspiring. It's giving yourself the use of an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You tell me, friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My face is so red!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure I'm flushed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sure we're playing this outdoors in Miami right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not cost you a bonus action. Your peerless skill does not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it does cost me an inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, for Scanlan Two because he has his own pool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. There's barely anything I can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you can do so much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can do so much. I don't see anything that's going on. I'm going to make an attack on the guy, because that's all I know how to do. On the big man. The god. I'll do-- shit, I can't do that. I'll do a Lightning Bolt at level five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: He's immune to lightning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that. Do I know that? Would I know that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would know what Scanlan knows, and he did know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was resistant to lightning damage last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Scanlan Two would know this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well in that case, I will do a Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level five Fireball?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's using five charges from the Fireball. Oh! No, can't do that. Doesn't have the wand. Never mind! Then in that case, he's going to do Bigby's Hand!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where does Bigby's Hand appear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right under his chin, and it's going to punch him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your wand gives a plus one to spell attacks and shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he has a wand! Okay. 17 plus 11. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bigby's Hand. Shit. It's 4d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d8, and you cast it at 5th-level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. They're all bad. 12 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage, actually. Bigby's Hand slams towards him and impacts to no effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it not count as magical? Or is he resistant to bludgeoning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that only a certain level of magic can break past his magical barrier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just swallowed my gum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Bigby's Hand slams into him to no effect and pulls back, and you're like, "That's "not good." Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That sucks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Oh wow. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are getting an education here in the first round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, bonus action. Who am I near? Am I near Keyleth? Can I inspire Keyleth? Is she close enough to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire Keyleth. I will sing: (singing) 25,677 minutes. Ask Critical Role Stats if you don't believe me. 25,677 minutes. That's how long we've been playing. Playing this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Talk about fucked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that the end of Scanlan Two's turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the end of his turn, Vecna's going to use his last two legendary actions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His last two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So he has five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To cast another spell. As he sees Scanlan One go flying down off the edge and Scanlan Two climb up, he glances down and goes, "You clever little gnome." He's going to attempt to dispel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to reaction Counterspell at 8th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At 8th-level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll. Oh, at 8th-level, it means that it nullifies the spell. He was dispelling at 6th-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you, Vecna!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch the Undying King in his magnificent, horrible form lean forward, going, "What? Ugh." Prepares for whatever he has coming up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it's going to be not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of that. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Thank god. I think Grog is by Vex, yeah? I'm going to cast my 6th-level Bones of the Earth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to place it? How many does it create?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It creates six at 120 feet distance. Five feet wide, 30 feet high. So I'm going to see where Grog is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Grog is not on the field. You don't see Grog anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit! That's right. Is this useless for me to do right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We're all ranged except for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get that fucking god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to scratch that. I'm going to scrap that right now. I am going to do an 8th-level Sunburst right in his face. 12d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a powerful spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12d6? Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's probably got a stupid constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a natural three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll use that legendary resist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's going to take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's five of them now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's taking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's used two legendary resistances.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two? I thought it was three? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's used two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He takes 12d6 and he is blinded for a minute. But he's got True Sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's immune to blind, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he takes 12d6 radiant damage, which is cool. Come on, big money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, you can reroll things, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, reroll those ones!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am again. Okay, so that's six, (counting). That was almost a six! My finger fucked it up. (counting), 45 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! He's rolling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) You're back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's going to burn his third legendary resistance to maintain. He tasted that sword. He does not want you on that field. You also notice as the detonation of radiant energy blasts his form, "Ugh!" he withdraws a bit and you can see the energy flicker and dropping from within his ribcage, you watch as a slightly burned, unmoving little girl begins to fall out of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really hope I didn't kill another kid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hope you didn't kill our sister.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People never change, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's off the side, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey man, at least you hit him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I was just starting to get over that first kid. Not that I would ever get over-- I'm going to use my bonus action to cast a Healing Word at 2nd-level on myself. And then I'm going to take whatever breath I have left and say: Pike! Ouch, hurting. I'm hurting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all hurting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got you, boo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did she get hurt that bad? Oh, she took the full thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She took 100 and-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth, you're going to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move up a bit, near Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Behind Trinket, I want to be close to Pike still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So there you are. That ends your turn? All right. Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing I'm going to do is deal with this skeleton in front of me and take a slash at him with my sword. So that's-- doesn't matter, does it? 20 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits, yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do 1d8 plus I'm actually going to burn two points of lightning into this too from Cabal's Ruin. So I'll see what one of that does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful. Eight points of silvered piercing damage plus seven points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the skeleton lunges towards you, you put the barrel of the gun-- Oh, this is the sword! I see. As you do, it cuts right through and bones go scattering off the side as it's destroyed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15 did it. That's fine. Next shot, I'm taking the shot with the skeleton that's next to Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you (sheathes sword, gunshot).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. And I killed a thing so I get a grit back. That's 30 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I have to switch dice. That's 1d10 plus 1d6 psychic. I'll burn another one point of Cabal into that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of this, this is Velora, plummeting down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points of damage plus five points of psychic and one point of lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's scraping at your betrothed, you fire the gun and watch as the skeleton skull blasts clean off the rest of the body. It scratches one more time before it clatters into a pile of lifeless bones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get another grit back. And now, where are there other skeletons? Who's getting it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three over there, one over there and three over there that are waiting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a whack at the one that's right next to Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he take only magical damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes damage from magical weapons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So your weapon is magical, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah but I'm not going to do-- technically is my weapon magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Animus is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So Animus will do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can do damage against him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but right now I'm better at clearing than anything. I'm not going to be the one who does damage to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like if you can break his concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's have a little fun. For my third shot, I'm going to turn on him. First, I'm going to cast Hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As a bonus action. Hexed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is necro, disadvantage on intelligence because fuck that guy and I'm going to hit him with Animus. I'm going to drop a point of grit for advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just chilling. I'm having trouble staying awake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. Well, that will do. 31 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Count the lightning damage separately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I know. So that's not bad. 15 points of damage plus six points of psychic damage. And let's drop six points of lightning damage into it. Three, four, five, six. That's not bad. 21 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, there was one more! I'm so sorry! I forgot to do the necrotic damage on top of that. So with necrotic damage, that's another six points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice both the blasts of lightning and the dark necrotic energy seem to be partially wounding but not on the level you'd expect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Still what I expected. I'm going to burn an action surge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, hit again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to hit him again because I got no more-- if everything goes well I can do 24 points of damage to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that might make him break his concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's now or never.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got to get Grog back. Grog has a trammel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use sharpshooter. Fuck it, let's see if that does anything. I'm going to add sharpshooter. I'm going to burn my last grit for advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got this, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see if that hits. This is probably not going to hit, is it? That's a six. That's okay. Yeah, probably didn't hit. Yeah, this is really shitty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How can you tell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can tell. 17 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Just passes through one of the open spaces in the ribs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've got two more shots. I'm taking another shot with no advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sharpshooter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 19 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. This one actually hits the armor and reflects off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got this. You got this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just on the cusp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 15, 22 points of damage plus five points of psychic damage and two points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's now aware of your presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he take a concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did. He succeeded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to break line of sight behind that wall. Just head up there a little bit. About there. Yeah. Actually, still against the wall though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that moves you up to there. That's your turn? End of Percival's turn, Scanlan. As you are now off the edge, you can see the edge of the tower vanishing away from you, the cyclone whirling above. Part of it catches you on the way out as you hit the edge of the cyclone that's circulating it. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw at disadvantage because you're falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Okay. So you take half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cyclone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would've been 16 points of piercing damage from the shrapnel being spun around it, you instead take eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing. Of course I can save myself, but I'm trying to do more than just save myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So noble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to save yourself so you can help us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Save yourself now so you can do something in 15 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or turn into something that attacks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I'm going to. (fanfare) I'm going to inspire myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're falling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every time they try to knock me down I just get bold. I give inspiration, every time I do. Every time I open up my mouth it comes out gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For what check are you doing that for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. I'm just giving myself inspiration in general. You can't do that?! Oh fuck. Well in that case, forget it. I don't do that at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. One creature other than yourself. And you have the ability peerless skill which means when you're making an ability check you can add bardic inspiration to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see anyone? Or can I inspire anyone from my distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, forget it, I don't do that. Shit balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do shit! I will Dimension Door to his chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, it's on. Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are currently-- we'll put you there, say you're in the space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not inside the chest, I would be hanging on the outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're on the edge of the rib cage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Bonus action. Am I within range of any of my friends to inspire them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet from there? I would say maybe,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex. How you looking? You looking rough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking rough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will sing that same song but as a Healing Word instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, not wasted. Never a song wasted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 2nd-level. Okay. And what is it? 2d4 plus six. 11 points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, tight. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Okay. So I've just landed on his chest. I look in there and there's no girl in there anymore. Shit. Do I see Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have enough movement to get to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try and leap into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I go out of melee range of this guy? Would he get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Because both you and Bigby's Hand are technically right up against him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out and you grab onto the edge of the other Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your turn. Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is everybody 30 feet of me? Because I can't really see the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Let's see. It looks like Scanlan Two, Vax, Keyleth, and Trinket are within 30 feet of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who, by the way, we didn't do meteor damage for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. This might be the happiest day of my life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a dick. Trinket rolls-- what is it, a dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is in your necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But still alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He only got 70 points of health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he just took about 130 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He couldn't do anything! Dang it. He really wanted to help out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you, Trink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a seat, big guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He even rolled pretty good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So can I fly where I'm in the middle of Scanlan, Percy, Vex, and Keyleth somehow? Within 30 feet of everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can do that. So you fly up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe not quite that high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take this down a little bit there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Crevice is what I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. That'll put you there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. And I'm going to cast Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who can she affect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on that is?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be Vex, Pike, and Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Scanlan Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan Two can't heal. So what did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rolling now. Sorry, guys, sorry. Wait, what's my spellcasting ability modifier? Why am I blanking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is yours wisdom?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going to die. Wait. Have you gone yet? Liam, have you gone yet? Did you do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Prepped for the future and forgot to do what I wanted to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike, what was the end total?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you add the ten for your blessing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no, I didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 39 points healed to Vex, Percy, and Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow, I didn't know that was a thing too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And yourself, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yes. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Don't forget, the blessing you have means whenever you heal anybody, they heal an additional ten points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about if you're in a strange tunnel? And you can't see anybody. Do you heal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got it made. You're safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I hate to win a game all by myself but I don't see a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Does that end your turn, Pike? You have your bonus action, still.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'd like to move again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You've moved about 40 feet so what's your flying speed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 40, isn't it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably. Know what? I'm going to stay because I don't know what my fucking speed is because I'm panicking now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. I'm pretty sure--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I actually don't think I have that sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay, I have it right here. Blessing of the Everlight. Yep. Flying speed of 40 feet. So you've moved your maximum speed while flying and you've used your action to cast. You can't move any further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a bonus action you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's see here. Yeah, okay. So I am going to cast Shield of Faith onto Vex, which gives a plus two bonus to AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, great. Thanks, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome! Yeah, I forgot to get that sheet when I was home, of the Blessing of the-- wings. Wonderful wings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right. That ends your turn, Pike. Up to the top of the round, it is now Vecna's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold onto your butts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets his legendary actions back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley, I think it might be in our text chain between you and me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Let me find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna, looking at the field around. You can hear now, the distant blasts and impacts of the battle below in Vasselheim. You see this giant looming shadow as one of the large mountain-sized arms of the titan swings in the air and causes this brief eclipse over and then slams down into the center of the city. You see dust, rock, and probably a dozen bodies flung in the air from the impact as they drift out of sight below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're okay. They're okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they got bounce houses. It's just out. There was a festival going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so horrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing at this, he starts chuckling to himself as the small gnome is crawling across the body and reaching out to the hand. "I do wish most of these creatures would find their way straight "to me. It's so much easier."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he looks off past you. "But you've always been an issue. You're how you all escaped "from my clutches last time. Well, how's this for a bit of irony, my dear?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's he talking to? You?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm under 100 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and save it in time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. 120 feet, you're in range. I need you to go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 1d4 from Bless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.
