lines.text: All right, so yeah. So your Hex is gone, but Zahra's Hex is up.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You guys get 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hit points to Scanlan, Grog, and Percival. All right, anything with your bonus action, or you good?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I get away with my bonus action? I used my entire movement to get there, didn't I? So no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. All right, also, at this point, the stones begin to shift. You watch as the tether that holds the various columns begins to separate and then begin to rotate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this island begins to move. This tower begins to separate to there. This begins to push away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're getting farther apart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of us are on these platforms, though. Those are all skeletons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a flyer, so I'm good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm hidden on the other side of the wall, so would I have been sitting there on my broom, like, as the wall has shifted away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, shifted outward like: "Ah, what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra! Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's distracted. She's like (yells) right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's shit going on, she wouldn't even have noticed me.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: My darling! Hello!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love your hat!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you! It's very hot, but I'm going to put it on for a second because she complimented it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, in my buff Michael Fassbender, but as a hot chick kind of way, I look down and I go: Grog! The gymnast thing! Whoosh. And I swoop down, my speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toward Grog?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm buff, and I'm bigger!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you need about 50 feet to get to Grog. 50 feet of your movement, you get down to where Grog is. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to scoop him up if he can do a little jump and whoosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the strength of your planetar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could, yeah. You could probably do that. Roll a strength check for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. I rolled a nine plus seven, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grab and get hold, and then--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going the rest of my movement, which you said I used 40 feet? 50? So I have another 70 feet of movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get him about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus to dash a little further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you have a bonus to dash, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I, because you held your action. Can I get up there and give him the cheerleader, like the figure skater, Go, Grog! And see if I can do the, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already used your action, unfortunately. That would be an action to try and do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's true, he does have a chain weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, so many levels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, this is kind of crazy. You guys are about ten feet below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the reach on your thing? Can I have him on my shoulder, you know, once again like the cheerleader thing? Ready, go! Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not as much as I wanted to do, but I'm not going to get any closer this round. I'm going to use that action to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you use your chain as a grappling hook?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm going to take a note from Zahra, and I'm going to, with the Sword of Kas, cast Finger of Death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that an attack action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's casting a spell, so you'd have to say you were holding that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'll attach the Chain of Returning, then, and throw the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you're pulled up and you're just out of range, you see the wings beginning to falter at the end of the round. You lob the sword up. As you're preparing it once again, the sword's voice pulses into your ears. "Kill him, take him, throw me!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just out of curiosity, you can't fly or anything, can you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! Hurry!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. That is a 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, nice! Ten, so 26--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We love you, Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 43, whew.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's my boy, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you swing the Sword of Kas upward, it lodges right into the side of the ribcage and up into the spinal column where this little bits of hanging, mummified flesh. You watch as a flash of energy hits in a blast of necrotic, angry dark energy. The sword immediately says, in the back of your mind, "Yes!" as Vecna (sounds of pain). Grasps the blade on the other end, where it's jammed through, and looks down at you. You can see this point of grin, of, "You're going to "continue to be a problem, won't you?" So the sword is embedded in his body. You do see, where it's embedded, a secondary spark of that glowing light is beginning to emerge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a bonus action to pull it out, but I don't have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, no. It's just in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got a stuck Vecna. All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a shot at one of those nasties that have followed them through, since that seems to be a good use of my energy right now. First shot is a 29 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 to hit? Okay, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to, just for fun, drop two Cabal's Ruin in there, for my own amusement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I get a sinking sense that Bones of the Earth isn't going to happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However! If anyone wants some really cool stone pillars--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It changed! The battlefield changed immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy to make with a dowel and a Dremel, guys. Recommend it. It's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, now I feel bad. 15 points of damage, two points of psychic, and six points of lightning damage to shadowy jerk number one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as it's flying (screeching). It looks heavily damaged. It's taken some hits in the fray, but it's still standing. It's still flapping its wings. It now seems to be noticing all the new targets on the battlefield, beyond the ones it was-- Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shoot it again. I'm going to drop a grit for advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kim Kardashian's fantasy wedding cake here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely enough, that's the name for the battlefield tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nine points of damage plus two psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hits him, You can see the drops of its internal fluids dropping out, but it's still standing there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fine. Then I'm going to target the other one with another grit for advantage. That's cocked. Feels bad, I liked that roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the same roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, same roll. (counting) 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, and I'm going to drop one, two, three, four, five points of Cabal's Ruin into that one. Drop, motherfucker. Three, four, five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop it like it's hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's ten, 18 points of lightning damage. 13 points of piercing damage, and six points of psychic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, this hat is so hot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still flying in space, though. They're both heavily wounded, but they're still there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck's sake. That's everything I've got right now. I'm going to try and scoot around the-- I'm going to get a little further back so I can grab onto that orb if things go shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we straight kill him, that's no good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he won't die. You've got to trammel him. You can't kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what would happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's quite clear we know nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wand of Fireballs can get him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on Fireball? It's a pretty long range, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although you can probably hit him with it and not hit Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could hit above him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fireball, 150 feet. Yeah, you could totally hit him with it. You're still prone on the ground, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you still have about 15, ten feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's near me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex is behind you, Percy's to the front and the right of you. Pike's above you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Pike within inspiring range, or--? Oh wait, actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Might be, yeah. Any of them would, including Grog and Keyleth. Actually no, because he's up here, he's out of range. I'm sorry, my bad, I forgot. He's right there. I'm like, this will be enough platforms! How can that possibly not be enough platforms? Lesson learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use five of my seven Fireball charges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five of your seven Fireball charges? Puts it at a level what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well it starts at three, and that uses one charge. So four, five, six, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 7th-level Fireball. Dexterity saving throw from him. That is a 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll damage, and he takes half.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, and it's 8d6, 9d6, 10d6, 11d6, 12d6! But halved. Okay, 14, 25, that was good. 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40, okay. So he takes 20 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, and I'll call out, I need a lift! I will bonus action 2nd-level Healing Words myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, terrible. Okay, so I get another ten points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is there somewhere I can get where I can be within 60 feet range of everybody? In a middle spot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're pretty close to being that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you move over to here, about this space, you could probably get within 60 feet of everybody, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's time for Mass Heal, which is 700 hit points spread out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna is going to use his reaction blowing a, let's see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Such a dick move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's used all of his legendary actions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has one last legendary resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what's the spell level on that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 9th-level spell? All right, so it's a DC of 19. He has to roll an ability check using your spellcasting ability, which is ten, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't Counterspell his Counterspell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're too far away from him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm not too far away from her? But that's not how it works, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has disadvantage because he's currently under Hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. So 17. Natural 17, plus ten. So 27.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Seven plus ten, that's 17. It's a 9th-level spell. He needed to roll a 19 or higher, so he fails-- (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hex wins again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well that was-- your hex was gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it was your hex.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It was my hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you said intelligence on that one, too?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Pardon me?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Because you called Hex. Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question. I'm probably out of range. Am I in or out of range, by his face? Probably just out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you attacked physically, in melee, you're right in his face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close to Pike-- am I 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, I'll say so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Pike, divvy it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so. Zahra and Kashaw, I love you both--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We don't need any, darling. We're fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Good for you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You get a hundred, and you get a hundred!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Pike, I don't need that much! I only need like 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does she get to choose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets to divvy up the hit points however she wants.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is doing real well. The temporary hit points don't come back, right? Yeah, Vax is doing real well. I'll take a skosh, a peppering.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just a skosh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need 20 hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I only need 66.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a full 100, what about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need more than a hundred.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you need more than a hundred. But she has plenty left over. Percy and Sam need more than a hundred.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does this work, Matt? Does she know all this inherently?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can see how fucked up we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So good, you have enough for everybody to get back to max. So that's the thing, everybody's back at max.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of the temporary hit points, but your regular max.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus the two for the feast, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, your max plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Vecna's also back to full. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Everybody!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so everybody's at full hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a fucking boss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love your healers, folks.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hug a cleric today!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can see the steam rising from Matt's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that finishes your turn, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Trying to think if I should move a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Move. Get out of range of him, if you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to try to get out of range of him and closer to my peeps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you'll get down, you can move about that far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a trammel, right, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, maybe, you know what? I'm going to hang out right there, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we trying to get all three trammels in in one round?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'd be killer. I don't know if we can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid he's going to try and yank them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends PIke's turn. Top of the round, we're back to Vecna, who gets his legendary actions back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wait, wait, wait! Is there anyone-- can I touch Grog, or is there anybody I'm near?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's fully healed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I know, but is there anybody that I can touch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be able, you could fly up closer to Vecna, or fly lower because you moved, with a fly speed of 20--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you thinking of blessing Grog and Keyleth, or something like that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have a little cantrip that I was going to use, but-- Oh no, never mind, it's not a bonus. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Vecna's turn. Frustrated and angry, as his Counterspell fizzles out of his hand, "Very well. First and foremost, no friends." He's going to go ahead and cast a high-level Hold Monster.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's been wonderful seeing you all again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The dragon cage is not concentration, is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the energy cage? Vecna's energy cage is not concentration, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It lasts for an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, really? Oh, poor J'mon!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The face Ashley just made!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nobody wants that dragon in the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail, and fail. I need both Kashaw and Zahra to make wisdom saving throws, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The wyverns fall?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: They better not fall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is he freezing the wyverns or the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. First luck. 22.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I rolled a natural one, plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern wings immediately lock in place as both of you feel your entire bodies slowly seize up. You, with the wyverns, plummet out of view.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you just kill our guests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys plummet out of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you have something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She did have a reaction! Can she use a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What reaction would you like to do?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hellish Rebuke? You'd have to take, let's see here. For Hellish Rebuke, you have to be hit first, and then you return, but the Hold spell prevents you from actually taking any actions or reactions.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is it Hold Person, or Hold Monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold Monster.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, I'm not a monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a type of-- here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a monster!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can do anything, human or monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a creature you can see. Hold Person is designated for just people. Hold Monster's a better version which can affect pretty much anything.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Did you affect me, or did you affect my wyvern?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How can you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He cast it at a very high level.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to have to leave now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You will be avenged!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: As before, we love you guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a lot you can do when you're falling!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We can't even speak, can we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You both quietly fall off the wyvern as you plummet in silence past the edge, plummeting down the side of the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys got major damage, though!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: At least the baby will be safe! (yelling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What baby?!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Avenge us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What just happened!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The three of us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three of us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the worst blue balls ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, okay, sneak attack. On my advantage, because of Vow of Enmity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already used sneak attack before the end of your last turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been tweeted at by eight billion people saying that on attack of opportunity on a reaction, I get sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, eight billion people!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of people. They should all follow your social media accounts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anybody get an advantage after the Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nobody's actually hit him with anything since then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh! I would like to know his wisdom stat, please, Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His wisdom is 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what we have to beat with our trammels.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to roll higher than a 22?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no, a 22 wisdom will get him plus seven, or plus six, to his--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a DC ten, plus five for each divine trammel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's his wisdom score. His wisdom saving throw? Is that what you want to know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So whatever he rolls, plus ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he's got to roll a 20 and then add ten to it. So we've got to roll--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. So the trammel is a DC ten, plus five for each trammel fused to the target. So he's got a plus ten to save. Assume that he's going to roll at least a ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we hit the trammels in with? Our strength?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have to get all three in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have to get them all in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At least two. Wait, is that the stat I should have asked for? I think, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It gives us a good answer.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Oh man, it took 114 episodes that we finally have a title name drop in our show. It's a critical roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trammel that shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14 plus 12. Help me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26. Thank you. 26 plus 14 is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've said that like 17 times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've had advantage on all saving throws this whole time and I haven't been using it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: How many of those things do you have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the Blessing of the Knowing Mistress!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't forget your blessings!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That wouldn't have been any better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 64. With a one-handed strike, right? Just a d8?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Is that necrotic? What is it, bludgeoning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the brutal critical, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's one more after the 76.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you took levels in fighter. That was my fault last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 81 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much were necrotic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of them. It's all slashing. Sword of Kas!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing and dangle, and as you do, you take the blade and jam it right up into where the force of the greenish energy in the chest where the ribcage is, and as you strike it, there's a burst of energy out from inside out of him, and Vecna screams as the sword at the back of your mind goes, "Yes!" You guys watch at this point to those who are close by, the red glow of the coal-like glow in Grog's eyes, the vampiric eyes are flaring now as the anger of the sword is now synchronizing with his hatred. As you jam it inside, the burst pushes the blade out, but now you can see another little sparkle of light within the inside of that pulsing glow in his chest. You can see now, three distinct, currently available weaknesses in his avatar form. However, he will continue to heal and if he heals, those begin to close. So yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So after he does that, Keyletar is going to swing around and find another one of those openings and I'm going to take my greatsword and do my multi-attack and jam it right into one of his openings and open it up a little wider. Got to get it nice and good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Getting it nice and good! Okay, so first attack-- opal dice, don't fuck me. You always fuck me. 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get a plus four on something, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, on attacks too! (gasps) 22?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We learned something! Second attack, got to roll better than a fucking four! That definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go and roll your damage on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't do this normally. Okay, six, ten, 15 plus another 5d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's a lot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm, because I'm a planetar!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pat Planetar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad! Eight, five is 13. Another seven is 20. Ones, not for sword damage. 22 and another six, 28!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28 plus 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 plus 15?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's 43.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh. 43 points of damage. So as you strike with the first swing of the greatsword, as it strikes across, it hits the side of the armor and bones and cleaves off, no impact. But you use that momentum to swing it around and jam it up towards one of the open wounds, right where the blast in the shoulder was, that Percy left earlier and was then opened by the rest of the party. As you jam it inside, you can feel the heat of the bursting arcane energy from the inside of his body, his avatar form fighting with every bit of impact and the proximity's almost beginning to hurt your face, but as you can see, a pretty decent wound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. That's my turn, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! You have to take 4d6 radiant damage because you hit me with a meteor shower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true! You can roll that for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy's getting hurt!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but he keeps healing--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Trammel time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he looking rough? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than those openings on his body, doesn't look too bad. But he looks pretty rough to begin with, because he's a lich. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten damage. Radiant damage.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Stop. Trammel time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to drop two points of Cabal's Ruin, or at least one point of Cabal's Ruin. I want to try and end this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who are you fighting? The zombies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the birds. That's 13 points of damage plus one lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you swing the sword around, you see it bite at you and you take your hand. Using Diplomacy as a gauntlet to protect you, you grab the side of its face and push the snapping jaws to the side, and using that opening, you take the blade and slip it up into its throat and it immediately collapses. You duck out of the way as its body falls, lifeless to the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next thing I'm going to do is take a shot at that terrible thing over there. And I'm going to burn a grit for advantage and hopefully get it back by killing it dead. Here we go. Thank god I did, because that was terrible. 25 to hit? And I'm also going to put one more Cabal's Ruin into that, just to put him down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good system, right?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm in shock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 points of damage, two points of psychic damage, and two points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one has suffered enough damage to be picked off, and part of its jaw gets blasted off, and it melts into that liquid black smoke-like disappearing ether.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For my third action, oh god, I'm going to run down a little bit. I'm going to try and get three of these guys in a line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're moving down this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a little bit. I'm going to be one space away. I'm not going around that way, but I'm going to try to back around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way? Okay, yeah, you can move over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to get too far away, because I'm not done with my movement. I'm trying to get the shot as I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 20 feet, and you can fire and hit three of these skeletons in one shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drop a grit for a line shot. Piercing shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yas, grit, yas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then get three grits back if they die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it, son!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a hit. That's 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That first one is ten points of damage and three points of psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's just enough to take them out. The first one is destroyed, and the damage is maintained. Roll for the hit on the next two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 22 to hit, and then dear fucking god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, he's going to die in that surround anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, shut your mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I get all my grit back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is hot.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You've got a little shielded person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have a healing potion left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. 4d4? That'll do great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Final roll? This guy's also in the line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was 38 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all three from one shot. It goes through their various spinal columns, causing them to shatter across the stone and slide off the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run in next to Scanlan and as my bonus action, hand him a superior healing potion. Can I not get quite there? Oh, in that case, if I didn't have time, keep a little closer to the orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The most expensive healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it organic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case, for my bonus, I'm going to take a healing potion. What is a superior worth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I know because I took one on the way up, after the death knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see at various temples, there appear to be various clusters of divine energies beginning to emit. It looks like there are clerical groups that are in the process of trying to conjure or find ways to protect the city, but at that moment, you can see a dozen or so angelic entities that have been summoned by one of these temples swarming in as about 25 gloomstalkers swipe in, and they begin to harry each other. At that moment, you watch as a giant arm of the titan swings upward and annihilates pretty much all of them in one swing: gloomstalkers and devas alike. All smashed and scattered in one swipe of the arm, as another one immediately with the momentum slams down into the city of Vasselheim, and the whole area below begins to shake, though you guys are currently tethered by these platforms; you don't feel the impact, but you see the city around and hear the empty, echoing impact of that fist on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Screams of thousands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get some healing and stuff, boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's near me? Can I inspire Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just in range. She's 55 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what she's planning on doing, but I'm hoping it's something to help me. What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do I get? A d4?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire you. I guess for my bonus, I should take a healing potion. For my bonus, I'll take a superior healing, which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8d4? It's too much to roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're carrying the football, man.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Nice reference.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once a year, I can do that. It takes a year to rest.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Welcome to Jocks Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 plus eight, so 33.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your bonus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said 33?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was I at before? One. I was at one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I prone or anything? I'm about to get hit by a goblin or something, aren't I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are two skeletons. They'll go down quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hold my action until after Pike's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What action are you holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere, at level five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Okay. All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to stay alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mass Cure Wounds?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Am I within 60 feet--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's near me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy, Scanlan, Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me find out real fast here. Mass Cure Wounds. Up to six creatures within a 30-foot radius sphere within 60 feet, so you could cast the sphere-- it's a 30-foot radius sphere, so you could get yourself, Arkhan, Percival, and Scanlan in it, if you wanted to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great. Done. Doing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that? What do we add?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d8 plus her wisdom modifier. Plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she rolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From New York. This is a 3,000 mile--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the future, you play D&D across states.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Across states, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she playing with lasers because it's the future? Remember when Mary and Will were here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then they got frozen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How excited we were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 40 points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 points to all of you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My action is triggered. I'm in a ball, and I'm pushing against it so I don't roll off the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you put the ball slightly into the ground, or no?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know how balls work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I disagree, sir.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the women in Exandria disagree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not in my experience.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: To whoever's doing my little bar at the bottom: I came in with 111 hit points. I now have 151. In case you're doing this thing down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never seen a show. We have bars down here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I still wanted to move a bit and do a bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you want to move, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I hover on top of land? I want to stay in the air, but hover on top of land, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to be right below where you were, basically?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to stay the same height, but if for some reason I fell, there would be land. And then as a bonus action, I'm going to take a superior healing potion that I have. And that will be my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets his legendary actions back. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's still Hunter's Marked, which is remarkable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I need you to make a concentration check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I add to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage did you take from Meteor Swarm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't remember. It was 30 plus 30 or something. It was halves of everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a 32, we'll say is the DC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I add it to what, my constitution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Hunter's Mark is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for the reminder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give Matt a couple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It should have been gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, this fight is crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna, who is clustered in this space, seeing the sphere appear down below, and realizing the issue of the immediate vicinity, is going to cast a 6th-level Circle of Death right in the space where he's at.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he will have disadvantage on his saving throw to maintain his spell, if it is a concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It isn't a concentration check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you still get to fuck him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need a constitution saving throw from Keyleth, Vax, and Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have advantage on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a spell, so I have advantage, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a spell, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's constitution, so you would not have advantage, technically, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It finally came into effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Does not succeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 23 still doesn't succeed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's 26 you have to succeed against.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a 26, exactly. On the dot. Right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20 plus eight, so 28. I used luck to get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. So that's half damage. That will be 10d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to be that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 41 points of necrotic damage, reduced to 20 to all three of you, because you saved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take the full 49?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you immune or resistant to necrotic as a planetar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I'm resistant to radiant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to make that melee attack against him. Reckless, bitch. Oh, so close to a 19. Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Go, Philip!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, thanks for introducing me to Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you like it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm beginning to like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rerolled the second one because I reroll ones and twos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) He doesn't know what to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he doesn't know which of his toys to play with.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: (whispering) He's got so much good stuff, he doesn't know what to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has level ten spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You used your reaction. Doesn't want to take another sneak attack from you. He's going to stay, because you guys moved too close right now. He's going to stay right there. He's right now grinning. You can see the flame bursting out of his left socket, the hand pulsing with power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, can't move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are we at? Whose turn is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Vecna's turn. You're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, Grog, and Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trammel round, right? Do I need to roll to maintain my grapple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he just needs to break the grapple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trammel him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take the trammel out of the bag of holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a valid point, actually. I should have remembered that, and I'll do this as the current circumstance. Because he does have the hand returned to him, each of you should have taken 2d8 cold damage for each hit. I forgot to mark that on the sheet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've dropped a lot of damage, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For melee? Melee hits? I got one on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's nine points of cold damage to you, Keyleth. We'll put you at 11 points of cold damage, nine points of cold damage, and another ten points of cold damage for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, what's the total for me? Nine, ten, and 11 all to me? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Grog, since this is the first time you've hit him in melee, that's been twice, so that's ten points of cold damage, reduced to five, and five reduced to two. Every single time you melee hit him, you take 2d8 cold damage. That was my fault for not remembering that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every time we hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. In melee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's remembering their blessings and all the cool shit they do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you have a cool blessing. Is it doing everything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's flying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fly and you heal better. You're pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the trammel out of the bag of holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to aim for one of those green openings and fucking try and shove that bitch in his torso.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the wound there, you have the inside of the green energy force there, and then you have one on the side of the head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm holding onto his rib, right? Can I get his head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably climb up a bit and go for it, because you're pretty big.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Muscle up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do a strict muscle.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: On an axle bar, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the thick fucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jocks Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because you're raging, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're okay, kids. We're okay. It is a 20, even.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 is the DC for applying a trammel on a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shit takes years off my life, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not athletics. It's whatever your strength modifier is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just strength. Thank god for the Titanstone Knuckles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had the Raven Queen. Who has Ioun's trammel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike has Ioun's. You have mine, right? And then the Raven Queen's is the janky one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ioun didn't have a trammel. Sarenrae never gave one. It was Ioun. Yeah, so Pike has Ioun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has Pelor, and he has the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you climb up, you take the trammel, its large, spiraling platinum form. Shout and jam it as hard as you can into the opening on the side of the head. As he turns to look at you, the flame burning, the trammel pierces into the side of Vecna's massive skull and temple. As it buries in, you can feel the flames from the impact burning around your fingers, as if the very surface of the sun is threatening to burn your hand off. The pain is extreme, but you push through it, and as you jam it, you can feel it spiraling in, and you turn it and twist. As it digs in, Vecna (roars) gives out this horrible screaming yell, and as it pulls in, you watch as the very end of it seems to glow with this bright, yellowish sun-like light. It's locked into place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, we've started this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was one. I have another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have my hasted action. Is there any point in hitting him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, because he can heal!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Not as a bonus action, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Okay, I will also cast Guidance on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's key. That's great. It'll buff you a little bit on your strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Before the spell ends, a target can roll a d4.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: d4 on a skill check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Add the roll to one ability check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that end your turn, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. End of the round, Vecna gets his legendary actions back. Grog, Haste fades from you. As the spell fades, you feel your muscles lock up, and your entire body is currently stunned for the next round. That's what happens when the Haste spell ends. So as you're clutching, your muscles lock up, and you're still holding onto the trammel, but your entire body is locked up as exhaustion takes over, and you're basically having to hold yourself there in place.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Hold your action. Pick something good and hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna is going to cast, with his last 7th-level spell, a 7th-level Banishment spell. I would like both Pike and Grog to make charisma saving throws, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why I got closer, motherfucker! (laughter and applause)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Now I am the master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, well done. So as the Banishment spell fizzles in place--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are a steely-eyed motherfucker, man.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That was clutch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna glares right in your direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. No words, just seething hatred in your path. That's going to end Vecna's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action until I can move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your stun fades, but that's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, would stun be affected by Freedom of Movement? Or vice versa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Freedom of Movement would not have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I guess I'm straight-up stunned, huh? Can't move or take actions until its next turn. I can't move or take actions until my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he loses his whole turn. At the end of Grog's turn, he'll use two legendary actions. He's going to cast, through the Hand of Vecna--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's starting to run low on high-level spell slots. You guys have been running him ragged!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he doesn't have another 9th-level Meteor Strike? Another 12th-level Halley's Comet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 7th-level's something fierce, though.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You both have matching dice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I love these. They're cruel, but I love these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to cast Finger of Death at you, Scanlan. Scanlan, I need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's really good. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. You take half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 49 points of necrotic damage, half of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half of 49.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be 24 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you resistant to necrotic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he made his save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I just was hoping it would be half again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much health are you at right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit! Goddamn it!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That was a huge roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that ends Grog's turn with that. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bonus action, I'm going to take a superior healing potion. So that's 8d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mercer, at the end of my turn, the stun fades? Or at the end of the round? I don't get a reaction or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say it goes through the full round, it would be at the next round I'd say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Oh! No, stun, there's nothing you can do to take the effect of stun away, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, Greater Restoration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's it? Not Lesser?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think Lesser gets rid of stun, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck me. Okay. All righty. I'm going to fly up to Scanlan, and I'm going to cast Cure Wounds at 4th-level. That's 4d8 plus my wisdom. Oh, that's good! 14, 21, 27. 27 plus three. 30 points healed!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I'm flying high, defying gravity!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Exalted. Exalted form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. (singing) Something has changed within me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hat. The broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, but it's so hot. But I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's the end of your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's as far as I can move, right? I can't move any more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get up there? You can move five more feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get over the edge of the floating building so I'm not flying over the crevasse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say right there. I'll put you right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right over the edge. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Just Scanlan and-- (speaking) No, sorry. That was terrible.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay, for the artists' sake, Grog and Arkhan are right next to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just so you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whenever possible.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: In case anyone was out there--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hands shoved in each other's crotches.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Getting each other ready.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Just lubing up. Glistening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan. I would like you to-- Here it is. I'd like you to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why so low?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have negative two wisdom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why have we not made fun of you for that way more throughout the years?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you think I make stupid decisions all the time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. In the grasp of Bigby's Hand, you suddenly become a tiny little fox!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I maintain concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You maintain concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm a fox.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I say?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You're a sly fox.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a fox.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Are foxes' wisdom better than Scanlan's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He Polymorphs you into a fox.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, can you undo Polymorph?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's terrible. Foxes can totally talk and cast spells, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So is this a concentration spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And that's a spell, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of that. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's not a concentration spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph is. But I don't actually know if that's what he used.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the end of Vex's turn, Vax, you're up. Polymorph: an unwilling creature must make a wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do I have written down constitution? Well, I'm wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll double-check. Wisdom saving throw. So anyway. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raven Queen sends her regards, fox!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did John have a dead pool on when it was going to fall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have gone with the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would have been my bet.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Was there a Jenga pool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we'll say you were there, you were there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fox is by your left hand.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Left hand, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. I see it. There we go. Fixed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thankfully, it's not sneak attack, but I rolled a natural 20 and rolled a one, so the dice get doubled to two, plus my modifier of six on the flame tongue is eight, so he gets hit for eight hit points of damage. Do I see a gnome or a fox?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume fox will not survive very long.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I don't think a fox has eight hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know a kitten has one hit point. Wait, five? Two hit points? A kitten's worth? A kitten's worth of hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a fox. It's like a cat or a dog. It's nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You might have to dagger-dagger-dagger me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say six hit points. So a total of how much damage was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was eight total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take two damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we'll call that my hasted action, and with my regular action, I will put my hands on the side of Ioun's chosen and use Lay on Hands to give him 20 hit points back, and then I will use the rest of my movement to fly back into Vecna's fucking face. And I have no attacks left, but I'll stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jenga.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jenga!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the end of Vax's turn--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the end of the night, it's going to be up in the rafters!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to cast a fifth-level Banishment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a fucking treehouse on top of the Fraggle Rock construction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I need a charisma saving throw on Grog and Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bigby's Hand remains, because concentration is maintained-- oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike broke. Pike straight-up broke.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay. It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, the first roll was a nine, right?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Oh no. What's that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first roll I did was a nine? It was nine, yeah.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It was either a six or a nine. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You have glue?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully it hasn't dried up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, we'll work on it while you DM. We've got it. Give it over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have advantage on them because of mage slayer, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you would have gotten to attack him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's actually a 20! I rolled a 19 on the advantage roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not enough, unfortunately, and mage slayer is a reaction. They both vanish from the space. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he take his half damage from me, by the way, from the crits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us back to the 20. At which point, the dark energy emanates once more, removing any sort of necrotic resistance from anybody within the vicinity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Removing resistance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we don't get necrotic for the next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arkhan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Pike give the trammel already?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she had it out in her hand. She couldn't give it to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She still has it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're gone, so that sucks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if we can break his concentration, they come back, right?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay, that's going to be 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's a straight-up 2d8. And yes, I said "two die eight," people at home. I'm old school, okay? I learned how to play in the 80s, and we say "two die eight." Not bad. That's going to be 30 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage. All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Halved? What kind of damage?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's 30. Straight-up slashing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has disadvantage on his saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 21, so he succeeds on the first hit.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, roll big.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's another 30 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten plus seven. That's 17, so yes, because the DC is 15 for the damage he takes, so he succeeds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's with disadvantage, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got this, friend. No, you don't got this.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: 23 for my third attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big damage.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I can't do much more than what I did before, but that's 25. Get a one. Roll a one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a two. Two and a three!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two and a three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn it. Okay, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back in the game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Arkhan, end of your turn?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's it. That's all I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you have the trammel. No, Pike has the trammel. Scanlan, how many hit points do you have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I do more damage to this guy, or do I heal Scanlan? Pike, what about you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm at 106.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: Yeah. Heal Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan's got the book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's the most important. I'm not important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Yeah, I'm going to fly down and do a healing touch on Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, I can take care of myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shut the fuck up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut your beautiful mouth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got the fucking book!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God. I'm rubbing my thigh, but there's nothing wrong with it! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't get any superglue to come out of this shit. I've been biting on it. I've been doing all kinds of shit to it. We need a knife.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no wonder it's not coming out.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I've got more work for you to do. Put the shield back on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need a knife or scissors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You chewed the end closed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did Arkhan break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the shield came off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay. It's the last episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 39 plus three, so 42. You get 42 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, that's actually great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you are freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. And I'm going to use the rest of my movement to go up and get in Vecna's face, as well, and be like, what's up? Oh hey, we're pulling an Alfred Hitchcock right now! Birds. Birds!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You can't see me" doesn't work because you're in his face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm John Cena.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's been a lot of damage done this round, hasn't there? There's been a reasonable amount.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Watch that, because it's going that way. Or you can put him on the base or something. Or we could pretend he's on top of that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my favorite mini game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a weird question: if I burn a grit point for an arm shot, can I make him drop his hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I burn a grit point for an arm shot, can I make him drop his hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's attached to his body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know it's stitched on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's attached to his body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I hit it a bunch--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't shoot his hand off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. I was spit-balling. I'm going to curl around the corner and I'm going to hold my turn for-- who's the last of us to go? I'm going to hold my turn for any spells that he casts, and I'm going to blast him three times the second he casts a spell on anybody. Right after a spell, I'm going to hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My turn? I've already inspired Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold for Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hold for Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold the book! And I will inspire Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, he's looking way too smug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's got one legendary resistance left. He's been saving it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll inspire Pike, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Pike, take your inspiration die. What do you say to Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Loves her Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: (singing) Loves chicken.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Let's not do it. Okay. Passing over the trammel to Grog, is that a bonus action, or that's my action? Because I'm right next to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say handing it over point-to-point, I'll allow it to be part of an action because he's right next to you and he's capable now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Because I was going to also try something else, but I don't know if I can. I was also going to try to clasp my holy symbol and try to see if I can do Divine Intervention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll 2d10. Roll the first one; tell me what you get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it. Why not, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you bring that third trammel back? You get to ask your god for something awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the giant dragon punch. We saw in the past.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's not a success, unfortunately. I know, sorry! Sarenrae's influence cannot break past this barrier right now, with your proximity to Vecna. The sheer force of his current presence is too strong.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'll pass the trammel to Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You aren't going to use your inspiration? All right, whatever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can't use it for that. Can I subtract whatever I roll for the inspiration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Unfortunately, no. He's going to attempt to Fire Bolt--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You mean reverse math?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, reverse math. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to Fire Bolt you, Vax. That's going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, fuck you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my reaction now that the end of the round is over with to make an attack on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's not until the very end of the round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was the very end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've stopped peeing myself.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Matt, we've got a good thing going on with this glue now. Could you pass me Arkhan back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love that we are working on miniatures at the table.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's helping us with our nerves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's very calming, working on minis.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You got some watercolors back there, Matt? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On his utility belt.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: We got tape. We got glue. We got everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this will be interesting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a question. Has Vecna still been healing with each round?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been dealing some pretty good damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we've been hurting him pretty bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Especially with Ark--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Ark reactor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's midnight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it? I can't feel anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fact that none of us are dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trust me, I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marvel Puzzle Quest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna is going to, through the Hand Of Vecna, begin to attempt to Teleport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take my shots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck that hand.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Fucking chop that hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have a reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does reaction work like attack of opportunity?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I do. I have a melee reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my shots. Shot number one. Yeah, as long as I've got reaction I knew what I was doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you held action, so yes.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: He can go anywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would have been 25. These are all sharpshooter, fuck it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it worth it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To keep him here? Yeah. He's running away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's trying to run away, trying to teleport away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to try to Counterspell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whoops)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That was pretty clutch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, you used your Wish last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that definitely works. (laughs) Okay, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still going to hit you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was going to save Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Try for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not? Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on the attack, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Well, I have advantage normally, reckless, so just a straight roll. 32?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's our Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's our Grog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, Liam.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, bud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 33. Hand stay on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hand stays on him, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Cool. That's just my reaction.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You trying to chop off his hand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, thought I'd maybe Luke Skywalker his hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Vecna's turn. He seems extremely frustrated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he just took from me, because I took my shots. It was 26 damage plus one psychic for the first one. Goddamn it. The other one hits, and again, goddamn it. 24 damage plus one psychic. And the third shot probably does not hit. Third shot does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With all the rage I've ever had, I will reckless attack. Grab the trammel from Pike and aim it right in his stupid chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength check, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, enough. Inspiration because fuck it, why not? Yep. That's 33.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't get that because it's strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right. 33.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's marking off a resistance. You just did that, didn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's actually not what I did, but you can think what you want. All right, so what's the grand total on that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 33 was the total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33. As you take the trammel, grabbing the bottom of the ribcage, curving it underneath, you thrust it up into the core center, it seems, of his chest, where the avatar arcane energy is amassed. And as the trammel squeezes in, you hear the guttural rage from the inside of Vecna, screaming, "You dare!" And as he inhales, the force of the voice is pulled back into a moment of weakness, and once again, you can see the fear flickering in the eyes. The burning rage of the green flame begins to diminish ever so slightly as the second trammel is applied.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to keep hitting him. I have my hasted attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a hasted attack. It faded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're cutting through the body, you see bits of Vecna's avatar form tattering and falling apart. I would like you to make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were told and knew that you could not kill a god. A god that ascended from a lich form generally has the capability, if the body is destroyed, to reform elsewhere. You begin to get the sense that at a certain point, if you end up destroying this avatar form, it might ruin everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As in, don't use the book?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As in, don't keep attacking him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As in don't kill him.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: JOE

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally, it's all we got.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Time to cross the streams.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, that ends your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 106. I'm fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on Scanlan at 3rd-level. 19 plus three is 22 hit points, and I'm going to fly down next to Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get roughly to the edge here with your 50 movement. I'll say you can land. Sure. I'll allow it. Okay. That ends your turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use a bonus action to look over my shoulder and see everyone that I know. I'm going to see my sister and her husband. I'm going to see the woman that I love. I'm going to see Grog. I'm going to see Arkhan. I'm going to see my friend Scanlan. And then I'm going to dig into Vecna's eye and stab away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do too much damage!

lines.text: You haven't rolled a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. He just told us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two rolls here, unused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an athletics check, so roll athletics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 plus five, 24. Grapple fails.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That was my-- (clattering over Skype) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: Can you grapple him?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give it a try, Keyleth. Because what difference does it make? You have nothing to lose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can read all languages as a planetar.

lines.text: Okay. How do you inspire her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I have it now.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Well, not both arms are currently grappled to the point where the arms can't move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, because there's a lot of people grappling him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little wishy-washy at this size. All right, so Scanlan, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Counterspell.
