lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For no reason.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Scanlan has had the craziest last hour ever!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You just killed, dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gods. Oh my Pelor. Oh my Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Am I close to Keyleth at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're actually right up there with Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to float by Keyleth.

lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to float by Keyleth. Cast Guidance on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And as a bonus action, cast Sanctuary on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. That finish your turn, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I move again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to move close to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn, he's going to use two more legendary actions to attempt to cast 4th-level Banishment on Scanlan. He's running through what things he can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 4th-level Banishment on Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a charisma saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burt Reynolds, do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30. I'm charisma as fuck! (laughter)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is craziness!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll two. Second roll 18.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: We got to go to Vegas after this is done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna is going to try again. He's going to cast another Banishment on Scanlan. "Would you just be "rid of me, finally? Go! Die!" Make another charisma saving throw.

lines.text: Does Vecna have to speak to cast Banishment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Not good, both.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Does anyone have anything that negates--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can inspire yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not for a saving throw, he can't. What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Vecna, who's being held by all, (chuckles) "Come on, show me what you're worth."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do that right now. I'll use my reaction against mage slayer, and I'm going to punch him in the face. Just punch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you watch as one of the titan's arms is now rising up over the tower. You get the sense he's getting really desperate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus. Just trying to break concentration, so I'm going to (punch).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do what you've got to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 to hit. 1d4. Three plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total damage is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got to roll at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does. 12 and 12 plus seven each. So yeah, he succeeds. That's the end of Vecna's turn, who's locked in place. Now it's your turn, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has healed 50, though, in theory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did. He healed 50 hit points in the last turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So hit him 50 points, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not used to hitting on those. Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Just the one to break his concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I already rolled high.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close your eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It didn't help for me earlier; I rolled a three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close your eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck me. Oh shit. 28.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 36. That's a one, but I've got to re-roll it. 42. Yeah. 58.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. He wasn't like 20 points away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So he has to make a DC at half that, which is going to be DC of 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no. Not on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On saving throws? If I damage you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Any time with mage slayer? Oh, that's right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you damage a creature that's-- yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, that's crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You made this world, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I know. And with that, Scanlan appears back in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will forego the rest of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay, that's the end of Grog's turn. Vex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huddle in fear at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi. I'm back there. Come join me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use my action to go fetal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your health at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. I'm 88.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's under a hundred, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm going to cast Cure Wounds at 3rd-level on Percy. Six, nine. So 11. No, 12, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus action, I'm going to take a greater healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's 4d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move, as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Whoa, that's good. 11 plus four is 15 to me. And then I'm going to run over to Percy, and I'm going to hold his hand.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm going to keep looking up at what's going on up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end that. Vax, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I would like to cast Compelled Duel on Vecna. It's a long shot, but I'm going to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One creature that you can see within range must make a wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is drawn to you, compelled by your divine demand.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's a weird paladin spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's always a one out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I would like to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is a 24.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Okay. So that didn't work. For my action, I would like to steal a bonus kiss from Keyleth of the Air Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't believe you've kissed her in her Keytar form, so it's a new experience for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every different form-- male, female, big, tall, small, whatever-- I'm in love. And I would like to use my regular action to fly in front of Scanlan Shorthalt, five feet in front of him, and splay my wings as wide as they can and flip the double birds to the biggest dick on the fucking planet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (air horns)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In front of Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tape is wearing off. It's worked well enough for most of it. Vecna's going to take attack of opportunity on you as you rush by.

lines.text: Good.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can he take an attack of opportunity physically with me hanging onto his hand and her on the other hand? I'm just along for the ride?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're swung along as he strikes. (screams) Swing in place. That's going to be a ten. There we go. 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. I'll use uncanny dodge to reduce it to half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. That is 24 points of cold damage, and you're immune to paralysis, so it doesn't do anything else. All right. Arkhan.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: There's nothing to be done here. Can I hold movement or is it hold action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to name the action.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay. I will hold my action in case he disappears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I fly down over Scanlan's shoulder and attempt to read the damn book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You probably have to take the tome from him to read it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is a cool tableau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan's being held up by Bigby's Hand in the center. Black-winged angel of fate and death on one side. The white-winged planetar of Keyleth representing life on the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With antlers. Always antlers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the book from Scanlan. You spend your action to try and read it?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you can, because your planetar form--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get anything? What do I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got inspiration and d4, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just read it. It's his saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He saves. You just read it. You begin to recite from the text like Scanlan did. As the mysterious words begin to emit from the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me take a quick picture of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [music]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should be texting that fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you guys want to do this? (shouting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Describe your support of this. You guys are holding Vecna back. How do you prepare for this, as he's currently being held by these trammels in place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab Percy up on the broom so we can fly up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the immovable rod out of the bag of holding, and I put the heel of my hand against the trammel as it starts to push, just to help it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Scanlan like a football for old times' sake and I come up behind Keyleth and I kiss her on the cheek and stare forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all spoon each other as a winged spooning circle while holding Scanlan while holding the book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I make sure Pike's with me over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I fly up next to Grog, and if he has a free hand, I hold the other hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I hold hands with Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall. There is a platform not too far from you. I would like those who were clasping on to Vecna to make a strength saving throw to try and capture yourself on the edge.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Is anyone within ten feet of me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog and Pike are.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You get a plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I rolling, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're flying; you're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can J'mon catch anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, the force cage is still in place. It lasts for an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all take a moment to imagine what you've lost, what you've gained. Everything has led to this moment. And in the quiet and the stillness, you hear a new sound. It's thousands and thousands of distant voices cheering from the city of Vasselheim below. Of wyvern and eagle riders above you. But a small example of the hundreds of thousands of lives you may have saved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm staring at Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same. Holding on desperately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else do anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I go up to Vax. Palm over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand did come off, actually. The body vanished, but the hand, the artifact still remains behind.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Then it's time to destroy this thing once and for all. I kneel down, and I place the hand down on the ground. I raise my axe above my head and I say a prayer to Tiamat. And I bring the axe down and chop my hand off, put Vecna's hand on, use my healing pool to heal, and teleport out. I'm sorry, it was just business. Until we meet again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we just get janked? We just got robbed! It's hard to get out of here, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) You guys watch as Arkhan--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you in the next campaign, motherfucker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Power move!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that just happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you know. Yeah. Don't congratulate him! Don't encourage that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to end tonight's game. We'll pick up on this next week. Holy shit, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What. Holy fuck, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are the luckiest motherfucker, I swear to god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Ooh, but I dispelled it. That's why I moved closer."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lucky and smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: MVP'ed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You trained us all.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: We learned it from watching you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, we did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, on that note, those of you who are still with us, thank you for being so patient.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Those of you who are still with us?" It's fucking everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope so. I know it's been long. We're at 12:40.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it is late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is so late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But what a way to finish a final boss, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't use two of my luck. I saved them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After all this time, you finally saved them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that could have gone real bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And his ability discorporation. When Vecna drops to zero hit points, his avatar form is destroyed but his essence travels back to his phylactery demiplane just beyond the Prime Material, and he is unable to take physical form for a time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That punch was

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he would have still been a god, technically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would have had to have done five more games for this thing to end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would have gone into a few more sessions, and he would have come back with far more knowledge and far more preparation before he's up against you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone was clutch. Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In another form. Can read all languages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam. You were trying to save a Wish for me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the gnarliest map of all time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's late.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We pick this up next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. Oh, we ain't done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I get to play the first two minutes of the game.

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Johnson, we love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Johnson!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're so glad you were here from the start of the game, Ash!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is your call in the morning?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you Blindspot for releasing her early enough to come play with us tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Blindspot. Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching. We'll pick this up next week. Until then, rest well, we love you, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [music]
